duties_responsibilities.duty: Work closely with development engineers to achieve testing needs and maintain constant communication.
Construct and maintain test units, lab test fixtures, and field test sites.
Execute various lab and field tests, report general findings to development team, both verbally and written.
Monitor health and productiveness of test unit fleet, ensuring units are operating and contributing to test objectives.
Perform mechanical and electrical repairs to test units and keep track of changes or repairs made.
Maintain up-to-date calibration of lab equipment.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate’s degree in Electronic/Mechanical Engineering Technology or equivalent a plus)
